::Astral/Recklessa::

Astral shruggs in his chair, looking out the cockpit and watching she 
Alliance island approaching quickly.

"Well, I know we got more than 30 bots. Don't know how much more. 
We're the best, of course. We're known as the Alliance. Zardus is the 
commander, you might wanna ask him some questions if you want to know 
stuff."

The shields of the Alliance base flicker off to let the shuttle 
through, and then flicker back on. The Iron Fist's landing bay opens 
and the ship touches down. Astral stands up.

"We're here. Follow me, I'll show you around," he says, exiting the 
shuttle and waiting for Composer to follow.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa lands near the entrance to the Iron Fist, entering and 
carrying Griplash to the CR chambers.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer::
> 
>      Composer sat down on a chair, just for a quick rest.
> 
>       "So, how large is your faction, and by what name do you go 
by?  Who is
> your leader?" Composer asked.
